name: fastlane-sigh
description: node wrapper for ruby fastlane sigh module

scripts.test: npm run -s faucet && npm run -s lint && npm run -s check-cover
scripts.test-nocover: npm run -s faucet-nocover && npm run -s lint
scripts.travis-test: npm run -s tap && ((cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls) || exit 0)
scripts.faucet: istanbul cover --report lcov --print none -- tape test/*.js | faucet
scripts.tap: istanbul cover --report lcov --print none -- tape test/*.js
scripts.check-cover: istanbul check-coverage --statements 100 --branches 100 --functions 100 --lines 100 2>&1 | grep ERROR: ; (test ${PIPESTATUS[0]} -eq 0) || (istanbul report text; exit 1)
